docs.snippet: The good wishes of the entire American people will be extended to Uruguay, whose new President, Andres Martinez Trueba, was inaugurated yesterday. Uruguay is an example of Western democracy at its best; it has every important feature of democracy and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The good wishes of the entire American people will be extended to Uruguay, whose new President, Andres Martinez Trueba, was inaugurated yesterday. Uruguay is an example of Western democracy at its best; it has every important feature of democracy and it has political stability to boot.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 2--Alberto Dodero, shipping leader, and one of South America's best-known personalities, died here tonight after having suffered a heart attack yesterday. He was 65 years old.

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Tuesday, March 6 An Italian film won the Grand Prize last night in the first International Film Festival here, but Gloria Swanson was honored for the best performance by an actress for her work in "Sunset Boulevard."
